title.nl: Controleer de status van alle sensoren
title.fr: Vérifier l'état de tous les capteurs
title.it: Verifica lo stato di tutti i sensori
title.es: Verificar el estado de todos los sensores

hint.en: Checks the status of all Motion- and Door/Windows sensors. Make a flow with the triggercard Sensor active at Status Check to process the results.
